import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"ログストリームを作成"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/create_log_stream"} context={"endpoint"} />

このデプロイメント用の新しいログストリームを作成します。指定した種類のログストリームがすでに存在する場合はエラーになります。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"Request"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined} />

<RequestSchema title={"Body"} body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"oneOf":[{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["siteLocation","ddApiKey","ddTags"],"properties":{"ddApiKey":{"type":"string","description":"認証に使用する Datadog API キー。"},"ddTags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"任意のカンマ区切りのタグのリスト。これらは各ログイベントで `ddtags` フィールド経由で Datadog に送信されます。"},"service":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Datadog で特別なタグとして使用されるサービス名。"},"siteLocation":{"description":"Datadog デプロイメントのロケーション。","type":"string","enum":["US1","US3","US5","EU","US1_FED","AP1"],"title":"DatadogSiteLocation"}},"title":"CreateDatadogLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["datadog"]}}}],"title":"Datadog"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["url","format"],"properties":{"format":{"description":"Webhook ペイロードの形式。JSONL はリクエスト 1 件につき 1 行に 1 オブジェクトを送信し、JSON はリクエスト 1 件につき 1 配列を送信します。","type":"string","enum":["json","jsonl"],"title":"WebhookFormat"},"url":{"type":"string","description":"ログの送信先 URL。"}},"title":"CreateWebhookLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["webhook"]}}}],"title":"Webhook"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["apiKey","datasetName","attributes"],"properties":{"apiKey":{"type":"string","description":"認証に使用する Axiom API キー。"},"attributes":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["key","value"],"properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AxiomAttribute"},"description":"任意の属性リスト。各ログイベントで Axiom に送信される追加のフィールドと値です。"},"datasetName":{"type":"string","description":"Axiom 内のデータセット名。ログはここに送信されます。"},"ingestUrl":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Axiom 用の任意のインジェストエンドポイント。"}},"title":"CreateAxiomLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["axiom"]}}}],"title":"Axiom"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["dsn"],"properties":{"dsn":{"type":"string","description":"例外をルーティングするための Sentry Data Source Name (DSN)。"},"tags":{"type":["object","null"],"description":"Sentry にルーティングされるすべてのイベントに追加するタグ。","additionalProperties":{"type":"string"},"propertyNames":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"CreateSentryLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["sentry"]}}}],"title":"Sentry"}],"title":"CreateLogStreamArgs"}}},"required":true}} />


<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"oneOf":[{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["id","hmacSecret"],"properties":{"hmacSecret":{"type":"string","description":"このシークレットを使って Webhook の署名を検証します。"},"id":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CreateWebhookLogStreamResponse"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["webhook"]}}}],"title":"Webhook"},{"type":"object","title":"Datadog","required":["id","logStreamType"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["datadog"]}}},{"type":"object","title":"Axiom","required":["id","logStreamType"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["axiom"]}}},{"type":"object","title":"Sentry","required":["id","logStreamType"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["sentry"]}}}],"title":"CreateLogStreamResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
